quote: Just trust that everything is unfolding the way it is supposed to. Don't resist... Great things are waiting for you around the corner. – Sonia Ricotti
fact: The name for Oz in the "Wizard of Oz" was thought up when the creator, Frank Baum, looked at his filing cabinet and saw A-N, and O-Z; hence the name "OZ."
joke: Somebody stole my Microsoft Office and they're going to pay - you have my Word.
